OOC: I wrote a post, but I dont' know if it went through, if it does come t=
hrough, just delete the most recent one if it does.

BIC:

Tucson smiles an=
d continues to hold Talon's hand.  It was what he hoped to hear.  Deep down=
 he was hoping that somewhere along the line someone like Nightstrike could=
 turn over a new leaf.  She was proof of it.

" Talon, I'm actually happy y=
ou told me this.  It actually assures me that my intentions aren't as crazy=
 as I thought they may seem.  Remember when we were fighting Nightstrike?  =
How skilled he appeared to be?  He gave us a run for our money, mainly me, =
but there was sheer talent in his approach, sheer talent that would not hav=
e been at all recognized if I hadn't encountered him.  I don't think Unicro=
n would have ever appreciated him for that, instead, he uses him as a puppe=
t to do his dirty work, not at all giving him recognition for his efforts. =
 And what does he do when they fail?  Disposes of them. But what if someone=
 else, who he thought was an enemy, actually turned out to be a friend? You=
've proven that it can happen, see?  It doesn't change how I feel about you=
.  So, this time, I'd like to try a different approach with Nightstrike.  I=
'd like you to be with me as well as Depthcharge and the others, because I =
want them to see the same thing.  If we show compassion to those who are ot=
herwise cast asside, because they aren't good enough, we can make friends o=
ut of enemies. Okay, let's go see if this works.  It might not."

He escort=
s Talon outside, holding her hand.

"Okay guys, sorry about that..  I had a=
 slow leak in two tires and I had a heck of a time finding spares."

Rat Tr=
ap nodds.

"Thought so.  Kinda is hard ta find tires for a big guy like you=
." 

Tucson now looks to the others as he also transmits to Lord Elder.

" =
First, I'm also transmitting to Lord Elder and Kup, and guys, sorry about e=
arlier, I didn't mean to scare you.  Okay, everyone, this is what I hope to=
 accomplish..  Nightstrike may be a minion, but Unicron doesn't value his m=
inions like we value each other.  I doubt he's ever been shown appreciation=
 for his talents and abilities.  And I have a feeling he's been given false=
 promises.  I'd like to try and talk to him, on a neutral basis, because ev=
en though he doesn't work for Hydras, he may just have some understanding a=
bout Predacon technology that may come in handy if Night Shift isn't able t=
o get the information on his end, due to the level of risk he's taking. I d=
on't want him to go over his head on something.  If he needs to abandon the=
 mission, please, inform him that I have nothing against it.  In fact, I ho=
pe he realizes when it does become too dangerous to pull out.  So this way,=
 if he can't get it, at least I might have a chance to get it on my end.  I=
'm begining to think that maybe I may have to resort to plan B after all."
=

Rat Trap swallows.

" So, Night Shift might not make it?"

Tucson shakes h=
is head.

"I highly doubt it.  It was a very risky proposition and I don't =
know why I even let him do it."

Rat Trap salutes Tucson Prime.

" Tucson P=
rime, I hereby volunteer my little rat aft ta a call of dangerous rescue du=
ty.  If I got ya outa there before I can do it for Night Shift."

Tucson lo=
oks to him.

"I can't ask you to do that Rat Trap. You almost lost your lif=
e back there, I can't have that hang over my head, absolutely not. We'll se=
e how it plays out.  He may be able to get out of there, but if he puts in =
a distress call, I'll assemble a rescue team for the job. All right, let's =
do this.  Lord Elder, Kup, I will inform you of my status after I've conver=
sed with Nightstrike.  Tucson Prime out."

ce together mi sister, a Minion... A servant of Unicron... Lord Perseus  an=
d Kenzo is awared of my true identity, and they provided me a sactuary and =
a new life; Now Tucson,do you still love me or do you hate me with all your=
 heart? do you want to know how I finish in Maximal Side?"

> Tucson =
quickly realizes that his com link was still engaged. He gets a slight star=
tled, but with a very sheepish grin on his face, he tries to answer Lord El=
der the best he can.
> 
> "Oh, Lord Elder, Kup, sorry about that.. I'm fine=
, nothing's wrong.. Nothing - at all.. I - I.. Um, well, I - just got a ver=
y strong batch of Energon and it kind of threw me off guard.. Caused all so=
rts of power surges but I assure you I'm no worse for ware. I - was just on=
 my way to Nightstrike when I ran a little low on fuel, so I was given some=
thing here and it had a few side effects... Look, I'm a little tied up righ=
t now, I'll definitely get back to you when I have more time. Tucson Prime =
out."
> 
> This time he manages to disengage the com link.
> 
> "Ohh boy, I=
 sure hope he bought that one. It's not like me to lie but some things are =
best kept to ourselves. And this time, I remember where I left off."
> 
> H=
e had not realized it but Tucson was capable of many emotions, love being o=
ne of them.
> 
> Outside the storage area, Rat Trap tries to cover for Tucs=
on and looks over to the area while scratching behind his head.
> 
> "Hmm, =
Wheels went inta the storage bay. He could've had ta replace a tire or two =
and is havn' a hard time lookn' for tires that fit his specs. Isn't too eas=
y findn' wheels for that big guy I bet." 
>
